recipes.name: 24 Hour Fruit Salad
recipes.instructions: Mix egg yolks, sugar and butter by hand slightly. Mixture should not be frothy. Microwave like scrambled eggs. Cool and blend in lemon juice and cool whip. Drain the fruit and fold in dressing. Add marshmellows.

recipes.name: 7 Layer Salad
recipes.instructions: Mix sour cream and miracle whip. Layer all the ingredients down to water chestnuts and then cover with miracle whip mixture. Refrigerate over night and then place eggs, bacon and tomatoes on top.

recipes.name: Aebleskiver
recipes.instructions: Separate whites from yolks. Beat whites until stiff. Mix jiffy mix, shortening and yolks. Add enough milk to make a thin batter. Fold in the whites. Cook in aebleskiver pan with melted margarine or butter as cooking fat. Cook on medium low heat until done.

recipes.name: Ambrosia Delight
recipes.instructions: Mix all together about 2 hours before serving. Serve a with a scoop of orange sherbet on top.

recipes.name: Angel Biscuits
recipes.instructions: Dissolve yeast in warm water. Cut shortening into flour, sugar, baking powder, salt & baking soda with pastry blender in 4 quart bowl until mixture resembles fine crumbs. Stir in buttermilk and yeast mixture until dough leaves sides of bowl. Dough is soft and sticky. Turn dough onto generously floured surface. Gently roll in flour to coat; shape into ball. Knead lightly 25-30 times, sprinklingwith flour if dough is sticky. Roll or pat 1/2 in thick. Cut with 2 1/2 inch round cutter. Place about 1 inch apart on ungreased cookie sheet. Cover and let rise in warm place until double, 1 to 1 1/2 hours. Heat oven to 400. Bake until golden brown, 12 to 14 minutes. Immediately remove from cookie sheet. 2 1/2 dozen biscuits  do ahead: place dough in lightly greased bowl, cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate no longer than 3 days.

recipes.name: Angel Food Cake
recipes.instructions: Beat flour, sugar, egg whites, and salt until foamy. Sprinkle cream of tartar over whites. Beat until stiff but not dry. Fold in sugar a small amount at a time. Add flavorings. Sift in dry ingredients gradually, folding in carefully. Bake for 1 hour at 325. Cool in inverted pan for 1 hour.

recipes.name: Apple Cake
recipes.instructions: Cream butter and sugar. Add eggs and beat well. Add dry ingredients alternately with grated apple. Add nuts. Place in a greased and floured 9x13 inch pan. Bake at 350 for 35 to 40 minutes. Lemon sauce: bring 1 1/2 cups of water to a boil. Add sugar and salt. Mix 2 tbsp. Cornstarch with 1/2 cup water. Add to water and sugar stirring constantly, until thick and clear. Add lemon, butter, and blend well.

recipes.name: Apple Cake, Chopped
recipes.instructions: Mix dry ingredients, add chopped apples and nuts. Then eggs, water and almond extract. Mix well. Pour into prepared 9 x 13 pan. Bake at 350 degrees or 55-60 minutes. Serve warm with sauce.  sauce: 3/4 c brown sugar, 2 tbsp corn starch, 1/8 tsp nutmeg, 2 cups boiling water, 2 tbsp butter, 1/2 tsp vanilla. Mix brown sugar and corn starch, add to boiling water. Boil 5 minutes. Remove from heat and add butter, vanilla and nutmeg.

recipes.name: Apple Crisp
recipes.instructions: Layer apples in a 9x13 inch pan. Sprinkle lemon juice and salt over them.  Mix togther: flour, cinnamon, sugar and butter. Spread mixture evenly over apples. Bake uncovered at 350 for 45 minutes. Serve warm or cold with or without ice cream or whipped cream.  from cutler's favorite apple recipes

recipes.name: Apple Crisp - Maureen
recipes.instructions:
Heat oven to 375 degrees.  Grease bottom and sides of 8 inch pan
     Spread apples in pan.  In medium bowl, stir remaining ingredients except cream until well mixed; sprinkle over apples.
     Bake about 30 miinutes or until topping is golden brown and apples are tender when pierced with a fork.  Serve warm with cream.

recipes.name: Apple Filling (Bottled)
recipes.instructions: Combine dry ingredients. Add 10 cups water. Cook in a large kettle until thick. Add 3 tbsp lemon juice. Slice 7 qts apples and add to sauce. Put into your bottles and process in boiling water bath for 30 minutes. It also works to pack 7 qts. Tightly with apple pie slices and then cover with thickened sauce and process. To use pour into crust that has been lightly floured and cook until crust is done.

recipes.name: Applesauce Bread
recipes.instructions: Cream butter and sugar. Beat until light and fluffy. Beat in eggs one at a time. Combine dry ingredients. Add some, then alternate with apple sauce. Add dates and nuts. Bake at 350 degrees for 60-70 minutes.

recipes.name: Applesauce Muffins
recipes.instructions: In a large bowl beat together the applesauce, egg, oil and honey. Set bowl aside. In a medium bowl, combine flours, baking soda cinnamon and nutmeg. Add to applesauce mixture, stirring just to moisten dry ingredients. Stir in raisins, and divide batter among 12 greased muffin cups. Bake muffins at 375 for 20 minutes. Makes 12 muffins.

recipes.name: Applesauce Spice Cake
recipes.instructions: Mix as for a cake. Add raisins and nuts. Pour into greased and floured 9x13 pan. Bake at 350 for about 45 minutes.

recipes.name: Apricot Breakfast Biscutis
recipes.instructions: In a medium bowl stir together flour, baking powder and salt. Cut in butter until mixture is crumbly. In a small bowl combine a 1/2 cup milk and apricot preserves. Add to dry ingredients. Stir until dough clumps. Turn out onto lightly floured surface. Quickly knead until nearly smooth.  Cut out biscuits and place about 1 inch apart on ungreased cookie sheet.  Brush tops with milk. In a small bowl combine sugar and cinnamon. Sprinkle over biscuits. Bake at 450 for 7 to 10 minutes or until golden brown makes 8 to 10 biscuits.

recipes.name: Apricot Leather, Nectar
recipes.instructions: Combine sugar and apricots. Blend or warm and stir until sugar is dissolved. Pour on plastic wrap on cookie sheets to a 1/4 inch depth. Dry in the sun for 24 hours or in a 150 degree oven.  nectar: add one cup water and 1 tbsp lemon juice to each quart of apricots. Add sugar to taste and process in a cold pack canner for 20 minutes.

recipes.name: Au Jus Gravy
recipes.instructions: Add about 1 cup water or broth and simmer until warm.

recipes.name: Baked  Potato Souph

ingredients.ingredient: Green Onions Chopped, Or Regular Or Dry

recipes.instructions: Bake onions, cut in cubes leaving skin on. Make white sauce,. Stirring constantly until thick and bubbly. Add the rest of the ingredients and additional milk if desired fro serving consistency. Yield 10 cups.

recipes.name: Baked Potato Topping
recipes.notes: first 4 ingredients cook in butter until tendeMakes 4 cupsr.  Stir flour sugar, pepper into yogurt.  Stir both mixtures tog.  ether over med-low heat until thickened and bubbly.  Remove from heat and stir in ham.

recipes.name: Banana Bars
recipes.instructions: Bake at 350 for 20-25 minutes. Frost with powdered sugar frosting.

recipes.name: Banana Bread
recipes.instructions: Add flour and bananas alternately. Add nuts if desired. Bake at 350 degrees for 45-60 minutes.   alternate 4-h recipe: 2/3 c sugar 1/3 c shortening 2 eggs 3 tbsp sour milk (3 tbsp fresh milk plus 1 tsp lemon juice/vinegar) 1 c mashed bananas 2 c flour 1 tsp baking soda 1/2 tsp salt  1/2 c nuts (opt)

recipes.name: Banana Layer Cake
recipes.instructions: Sift flour and measure with soda and baking powder. Cream shortening and sugar. Cream until light and fluffy, add eggs, beating well after each. Add sour milk, bananas and vanilla alternately with flour. Beat until smooth. Do not over-beat. Bake 25-30 minutes at 375. Make two layers.

recipes.name: Banana Wheat Bread
recipes.notes: In my eight-loaf mini bread pans, cook for 25 min.  One recipe fills the eight mini pans
recipes.instructions:
1, Grease a 9x5 inch loaf pan. Preheat oven to 350degrees                2. Combine honey, egs, vanilla, and mashed bananas in a bowl.
               3. In a large bowl, whisk together flour, wheat germ, salt and baking sida,  Make a well in dry ingredients, and add the banana mixture,  Mix together until dry

recipes.name: Barbeque  Roast Beef
recipes.notes: Cook roast in crock pot overnight , slice add sauce and warm.
recipes.instructions:
Roast the roast to medium rare. Fry onions. Mix ingredients except beef and simmer for 15 minutes. Layer sauce and beef. Bake at 200 for 2 hours.  Cover if it starts to get dry. Turn to 375 for about 20 minutes to get really hot.
      2006 McMurray Family Reunion  Estimated 65 people.  Cooked 6 rump roasts of approx. 4 lbs each.  Small green crock pot after 8 hrs, I had to slice the meat.  Lg white crock pot with two roasts, after 8hrs the 
meat shredded.  I 4 timed the sauce recipe to cover the six roasts.  We bought 8 dozen hamburger buns and we also had 3 pkgs. hot dogs and buns for the little kids.
      2007 McMurray family reunion  Estimated 52 people.  Cooked 4 Sirloin Tip Roasts, total 14 lbs.  We used about half.  We went through 22 hot dogs buns and 28 hamburgers buns.  I tripled the sauce recipe and didn't
leave any crock pot juices on the meat.  However I added about 2 cups juice instead of water in the triple sauce recipe.

recipes.name: Barbeque Beef On Hamburger Buns
recipes.instructions: Brown meat and onions together. Sprinkle 1 heaping tsp flour over meat. sauce: simmer slightly for 1 1/2 hours, stirring occasionally.

recipes.name: Barbequed Turkey
recipes.instructions: After turke pieces are cooked put into a crock with sauce and let warm.

recipes.name: Beef And Broccoli
recipes.notes: can use left over roast beef.   Saute onion in the olive oil.  Add the other ingredients.  Cook to desired doneness

recipes.name: Beef Rice Casserole
recipes.instructions: Brown ground beef, onion and celery. Add soup and warm water. Simmer. Add rice, soy and pepper. Pour into a greased casserole. Cook 30 minutes at 350. Uncover and cook 30 minutes more. Remove from oven and sprinkle chow mein noodles on top. Cook 10 more minutes. (chicken, turkey, or sausage may also be used).

recipes.name: Beef Stew
recipes.instructions: Brown meat slowly in shortening, 15 to 20 minutes.  Add the rest of the ingredients with the boiling water except carrots and potatoes.   Simmer 2 hrs or more.  Add vegetables, cook about 1/2 hourmore.  Thicken with a flour and water mixture.

recipes.name: Black Forest Torte
recipes.instructions: Heat oven to 350. Mix cake and pour into four greased 9-inch round pans. Mix together slowly and then beat for several minutes. Bake for 15 to 18 minutes. Cool slightly and remove from pan. Cool thoroughly.  chocolate filling: melt chocolate, blend in margarine and almonds  cream filling: beat all ingredients until stiff  assembly of torte: place bottom layer of cake on serving plate. Spread with 1/2 chocolate filling. Place another layer of cake. Layer with 1/2 the cream filling. Repeat layers ending up with cream filling on top. Place chocolate curls on top for garnish. Refrigerate until ready to serve.

recipes.name: Blueberry Lemon Bundt Cake
recipes.notes: MIx dry ingredients in a bowl.  Cream butter sugar eggs.   Add lemon juice buttermilk and vanilla.  dust blueberries with 1 TBSP flour.  MIx wet and dry ingred. add blueberries.  Bake at 350 for 50- 55 min. on lower middle rack.

recipes.name: Blueberry Muffins
recipes.notes: Preheat oven to 400 degrees.  Line muffin pans.  Combine dry ingredients.  Combine wet ingredients. Gently stir together until just moistened.  Stir together the last three ingredients to make the topping.   Fill muffin pans to near the top and sprinkle with topping.  Bake 20 - 25 minutes

recipes.name: Blueberry Orange Muffins
recipes.instructions: Cream shortening and brown sugar, stir in egg whites, milk, orange juice and orange peel. Blend in dry ingredients with liquid, stir until just blended. Fold in blueberries. Bake in paper-lined muffin cups at 400 degrees for 18 minutes. Make 1 dozen muffins.

recipes.name: Bow-Tie Pasta Salad
recipes.notes: served 21 adults and 4 children at Becky's baby shower
recipes.instructions: Mix everything together except green onions and almonds. Chill 3-4 hours before serving, add remaining ingredients.

recipes.name: Bran Muffins
recipes.notes: each muffin 1 weight watchers point

ingredients.ingredient: Shredded Wheat Bars Soake In Two Cups

recipes.instructions: Mix all together. Bake at 375 for 20 minutes. Batter can be kept in the refridgerator for a week.

recipes.name: Bread Pudding
recipes.instructions:
Place the 4 3/4 c milk., sugar and spices on stove and heat to 200 degrees.  Immediately remove from heat. (Do not over heat. Do not boil.)
     Let cool for 5 minutes.  In another bowl combine the 1 1/2 cups milk, eggs and vanilla.   Hand whip for 30 seconds
     Combine the two mixtures and mix with a hand whip for another 30 seconds.  Place 3 quarts of bread , loosely packed in a 4 qt casserole  Evenly pour the milk over the bread.
     Sprinkle raisins over the bread and milk mixture.  Use a spatula to make sure bread is completely soaked.  cover with foil and bake at 350 degrees for 1 hour, or until it reaches a consistency of Jello
     Just before serving, evenly pour 13 c of vanilla sauce over each erving.  Serve soon after cooing, it doesn't have a long shelf life
           Vanilla Sauce;  1 1/4 cups cornstarch,  1 1/4 cups sugar,  1 qt boiling water, 1/4 cup vanilla, 1 qt half and half cream.  
                   Mix corn starch and sugar together in a sauce pan.  Add boiling water and stir until smooth.  Place over heat, stirring constantly until thick.  Remove from heat and let cool.  When cool add vanilla and half and half.                  
     Note:  If raisins are dry, boil them in some water to plump them first or they will burn on the top of the bread pudding.

recipes.name: Bread Pudding Nellies
recipes.notes: Pour ingredients over bread (9 x 13 pan)  sPRINKLE RAISINS AND NUTS AROUND. Cover with foil and bake 1 hr. at 350

recipes.name: Broccoli Cheeese Soup
recipes.instructions: Steam first 6 ingredients for 20 minutes. Add broccoli and steam for 7 minutes more. In a separate pan make a white sauce with the rest of the ingredients ad to the vegetable mixture.

recipes.name: Broccoli Cheese Soup
recipes.instructions: Steam potatoes, carrots, celery and onions in salted water. Simmer for 20 minutes. Add the broccoli and cook 7 minutes more. In separate pan, melt margarine & add flour and milk. Then add seasonings. As sauce thickens, blend in cheese until melted and then add to the vegetables.

recipes.name: Broccoli Salad
recipes.instructions: Dressing:  1 cup miracle whip, 3 Tbsp cider vinegar, 1/4 cup sugar.  Mix dressing and refrigerate at least 1/2 hour  before adding to salad.  Combine broccoli, bacon, and onion in 9 x 13 glass dishSpread dressing Sprinkle cheese.  Chill 2-4 hours

ingredients.preparation: Mix Dry Ingredients.  Mix Moist And Stir

recipes.name: Brownies8
recipes.instructions: Melt chocolate and shortening together over very low heat, stirring constantly; cool. Beat eggs till light; stir in sugar, then chocolate mixture and vanilla. Add sifted dry ingredients, mixing well. Add nuts. Bake in greased 9x13 pan at 350 for 30 to 35 minutes. Cool. Cut in squares.

recipes.name: Burnt Almond Fudge Ice-Cream
recipes.notes: makes 4 quarts
recipes.instructions: Beat eggs with 2 cups sugar until foamy. Add vanilla, salt, melted chocolate and blend. Pour into freezer and the rest of the ingredients. Add almonds after ice cream has started to freeze.  spread almonds on a cookie sheetand sprinkle with 1 tsp salt bake at 400 for 8 minutes or until golden brown.

recipes.name: Buttermilk Chicken
recipes.instructions: Combine all dry ingredients in a shallow dish. Dip chicken in buttermilk,  then roll in dry mixture adn place on lightly oiled baking sheet. Bake at 325 for about 60 minutes, turing once. Makes 4 servings.

recipes.name: Butterscotch Treats
recipes.instructions: Melt butterscotch, stirring continually. Add chow mein noddles and nuts. Quickly spoon onto wax paper and let the cookies set up.

recipes.name: Calico Soup
recipes.instructions: Mix all together. Serve whne hot. Cook in a crock pot or soup pan

recipes.name: Calzone Dough
recipes.instructions: Dissolve yeast in 1/4 cup warm water. Combine flour and salt. Add yeast mixture, rest of water and oil. Mix well, turn out and knead for 10 minutes until smooth. Let dough rise, covered in an oiled bowl until doubled (1 to 1 1/2 hours). Punch dough down. Roll out and cut into circles. Fill with desired filling, fold over and seal edges with a fork.  Brush with egg on top. Place on cookie sheet dusted with cornmeal and bake at 350 until browned (about 20 minutes).

recipes.name: Candied Nuts
recipes.instructions: In a heavy sauce pan combine sour cream, sugar and vanilla. Boil to 225 and mix in nuts. Spread out on cookie sheet and let harden.

recipes.name: Caramel Popcorn
recipes.instructions: Add butter, Karo, brown sugar and salt together in a heavy 3 qt. pan.   Cook on medium to Soft ball stage.  Add soda and Cream of Tartar and stir.  It will puff up pour over the popcorn and stir until evenly distributed.

recipes.name: Carmel Corn Or Apples
recipes.instructions: Boil karo and brown sugar. Take off heat and add butter. Cool slightly and add milk.

recipes.name: Carrot Cake
recipes.instructions: Mix the eggs, sugar and oil. Sift in (in 2 or 3 times) the flour, soda, salt, cinnamon, and allspice. Add the carrots and nuts. Bake in a greased and floured pan for 30 minutes at 375. Frosting: appox 2 cups pw.  Sugar, 4 oz. Cream cheese, 2 tbsp. Butter, mix. Add milk to thin if necessary, grated)f0

recipes.name: Carrot Cookies
recipes.instructions: Cream sugar and shortening. Add egg and beat. Sift together dry ingredients adn add alternately with carrots. Add vanilla. Drop on greased cookie sheet and bake at 375 for 10 to 15 minutes.  icing: cream powdered

recipes.name: Cheese Balls
recipes.instructions: Mix all ingredients except for the crushed nuts. Divide mixture in half and form two balls. Roll in crushed nuts and wrap in waxed paper and then in foil. Keep refrigerated until ready to serve.

recipes.name: Chicken A-Go-Go
recipes.instructions: Combine bread crumbs, cheese, almonds, parsley and salt. Add onion to melted butter. Dip chicken pieces into onion butter, then coat thickly with crumb mixture. Place in shallow baking pan. Bake uncovered in hot oven (400) for 1 hour or until tender.

recipes.name: Chicken And Rice
recipes.instructions: (i sometimes use 2 cans cream of chicken soup and dried onion wit 1 1/2 cups water) mix all of the soups together. Melt or soften 1 stick of butter (delete butter) put 1/2 of soup mixture in bottom of pan. Add 1 1/2 cups long grain rice over the soup. Pour butter over the rice. Lay chicken in the mixture and cover with the remaining soup mixture. Bake at 325 degrees.   Approx 1 to 1 1/2 hours

recipes.name: Chicken Baked Garlic
recipes.instructions: Bake at 350 for 20-30 min until done

recipes.name: Chicken Beef Dish
recipes.instructions: Place chipped beef on bottom of shallow baking dish. Layer chicken breasts on beef. Then place bacon strips on top. Cook in oven 15 minutes at 375 degrees and 15 minutes covered. Pour off grease. Separate chicken.  Mix sour cream and soup and pour oven ckicken/beef/bacon dish. Continue cooking uncovered for 1/2 hour.

recipes.name: Chicken Breasts With Mushrooms And Cream
recipes.notes: Cook chicken in the oven at 350-400 degrees until cooked through (20-30 min. depending on thickness).  In a saucepan saute mushrooms, green onions and rosemary in butter, until they start to get soft.  Add beef bullion and water and cook a few minutes more.  Add cream and cook a little to thicken.  Pour over the cooked chicken breasts.  Sprinkle with parmesan cheese.

recipes.name: Chicken Cordon Bleu
recipes.instructions: Pound each chicken breast until flat. Sprinkle salt, pepper and thyme on the chicken. Wrap swiss cheese cubes in ham slices and place in the middle of the flattened chicken breast. Roll up chicken. Roll in melted butter and then coat with corn flake crumbs. Place in a greased baking dish and bake for 40 minutes in a 400 degree oven.  sauce: mix all ingredients together and heat

recipes.name: Chicken Divan
recipes.instructions: Layer broccoli, then chicken. Combine next 5 ingredients and top with bread crumbs. Bake at 350 for 25-30 minutes in a 9x13 inch glass pan.

recipes.name: Chicken Enchiladas
recipes.notes: bake 350 degrees 35 - 40 min.  combine first five ingredients.  Spoon into tortillas and roll.  Place in lightly greased pan.  Pour enchilada sauce over and top with one cup cheese.

recipes.name: Chicken Mandarin
recipes.instructions: Bake at 350, approximately 45-60 min.

recipes.name: Chicken Pot Pie
recipes.instructions: Heat oven to 400. Mix vegetables, chicken and soup in ungreased glass pie plate. Stir together remaining ingedients with fok until blended. Pour into pie plate. Bake 30 minutes or until golden brown

recipes.name: Chicken Salad - Laura
recipes.notes: Cook and season chicken.  Mix ingredients except cashews.  Add cashews just before seving.
recipes.instructions: Mix first six ingredients. Add cashews just before serving.

recipes.name: Chicken Vegetable Croissant Appetizer - Pampered Chef
recipes.instructions: Roll out crescent roll into large cookie sheets with sides. Bake crescent rolls.   Mix together cream cheese, dill, mayo and garlic.  Spread over crescent rolls. Add all other toppings and put cheese on top.

recipes.name: Chili
recipes.instructions: Cover beans with a large amount of water. Boil 5 minutes and let soak 1 hour (or overnight). Cook for about two hours or until soft. Simmer all ingredients together unitl chili thickens and flavors are blended.

recipes.name: Chili  Sauce

recipes.instructions: Put tomatoes, peppers and onion through the food grinder. Combine and cook together this first mixture with salt and sugar until it begins to thicken. Add vinegar and the rest of the spices. Cook until thick and seal in hot jars immediately.

recipes.name: Chocolate Cake
recipes.instructions: Sift dry ingredients. Add wet ingredients. Bake 350 for 35-40 min. *cream filling for cupcakes - double this: 1 c. Powdered sugar 2 tbsp. Soft butter 2 tbsp. Shortening 1/2 tsp. Vanilla 1 1/2 tbsp. Milk dash of salt beat until fluffy

recipes.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.instructions: Cream shortening and sugarf1  until light and fluffy. f0Beat in eggs and vanilla.f1  f0  Add dry ingredients.  Mix untill just blendedf0Add chocolate chips. Bake on an ungreased cookie sheet at 350 for 8-10 minutes. Makes about 6 dozen cookies.f1      (I use a dark cookie sheet without sides.  I use a cookie scoop and bake for 11-12 minutes in my gas oven)

recipes.name: Chocolate Chip Date Cake
recipes.instructions: Cover dates with boiling water, add soda and cool. Cream shortening, sugar, eggs and vanilla. Add to dry ingredients. Pour batter into a greased and floured 9x13 pan. Cover batter with a mixture of: 1/2 c. Chopped nuts, 1/2 c. Chocolate chips, 1/2 c. Brown sugar. Bake at 350 for 35-40 minutes.

recipes.name: Chocolate Chocolate Chip Cookies
