recipes.instructions:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees.   Combine dry ingredients.  In a separate bowl, cream sugars, eggs and butter.  Sift dry ingredients in butter mixture.  Drop by teaspoons onto ungreased cookie sheet.  Bake for
  10 minutes.  Nuts may be added  Can use 1/2 white chocolate chips and 1/2 regular chocolate chips

recipes.name: Chocolate Crinkles
recipes.instructions: Cream shortening, sugar and vanilla. Beat in eggs, then chocolate. Sift together dry ingredients, blend in alternately with milk. Add nuts. Chill 3 hours. Form into one inch balls. Roll in powdered sugar. Place on greased cookie sheet 2 to 3 inches apart. Bake at 350 for about 15 minutes. Cool slightly; remove from pan.  (15 min may be too long if you want the cookies soft)

recipes.name: Chocolate German Pecan Drop Cookies
recipes.instructions: Cream butter and sugar; blend in egg and melted, cooled chocolate. Fold in dry ingredients, vanilla and buttermilk. Bake on ungreased cookie sheet at 400 degrees for 8 minutes when cooled, frost with coconut pecan frosting and a touch of chocolate frosting if desired.   for frosting mix sugar, milk, margarine, vanilla and egg yolks in a heavy saucepan. Cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until mixture thickens, about 12 minutes. Stir in coconut and pecans.

recipes.name: Chocolate Waffle Turtles
recipes.instructions: Melt chocolate adn margarine together, mix well and set aside. Beat the eggs and then add in the sugar. Mix flour, baking powder and vanilla. Combine with the chocolate mixture. Mix some more. Scoop a small spoonful onto each quarter of a waffle iron (high heat setting). Close. Cook 60-90 seconds. Cool and frost.  christian hyde

recipes.name: Chocolate Zucchini Cake
recipes.instructions: Bake in a greased angel food pan at 350 for 1 hour. Leave in pan for 15 minutes before removing.

recipes.name: Chokecherry Jelly
recipes.instructions: Bring to a boil and add 7 cups sugar. Boil again for 5 minutes. Put in jars and seal with wax. To make juice to use as pancake syrup. Double the amount of juice and sugar. Add 1 pkg. Pectin. Boil 5-7 minutes depending on how thick you want it.  About 1/2 to 2/3 an ice-cream bucket of berries makes a double batch (9 little jars) of jelly.  6 C juice and 2 pkg pectin and 9 C sugar.  no lemon juice.  cooked berries in steamer for about 2 hours.

recipes.name: Chow Mein Casserole
recipes.instructions: Mix together mushroom soup, chicken soup, tuna and nuts. Brown together in butter celery and onion. Add to soup mixture. Place in casserole dish.  Alternate layers of noodles and soup mixture. Bake at 400 for 20 minutes. Serves 8.

recipes.name: Cinnamon Rolls
recipes.instructions: Put 1 tbsp yeast in 1/2 cup warm water and set aside. In a large bowl combine sugar, shortening, salt and hot scalded milk. Cool to lukewarm. Stir in unbeaten egg and yeast. Gradually add flour to make a fairly soft dough. Cover and let stand for 15 minutes. Mix sugars and cinnamon and raisins. Roll out dough about 12x20 inches. Brush with melted butter;  sprinkle with sugar mixture. Roll like a jelly roll. Cut 3/4 in slices. Put on a greased pan. Brush with melted butter. Let rise until double in bulk (1 hour). Bake at 350 degrees for 25-30 minutes. Glaze while still warm.

recipes.name: Cinnamon Rolls, Deanne's
recipes.instructions: Mix rolls. Let stand until doubled.   Roll out.   Fill with butter, cinnamon, brown sugar , white sugar and raisins.  Let rise until doubled. ( 30 min. )   Bake at 350 about 15 min.

recipes.name: Cinnamon Rolls, Simply Superb
recipes.notes: From newspaper
recipes.instructions:
Combine the milk, water and 2 Tbsp butter, cook for 1 min. on high in the microwave.  Place in bread machine in order suggested by the manufacturer, the milk mixture, egg, sugar, flour, salt and yeast.  Select dough  cycle and start.   When dough is ready, roll into a large rectangle and spread with the softened butter.  Sprinkle with brown sugar and cinnamon.  Starting from long side, roll up and pinch to seal to seal.  Cut in 12 slices 
 (using dental floss is easiest)    Place on greased jelly roll pan; cover and let rise in a warm place 30 min.  then spread with frosting and enjoy.  They can be refrigerated and then reheated in the microwave for 10-20  sec.
on low.  
Cream Cheese Frosting:  4 oz. softened cream cheese with 2 - 3 tbsp. melted butter.  Add 2 - 2 1/2 c powdered sugar and 1/2 tsp vanilla.  Beat until creamy
Orange  Roll Variation:  On rolled out dough spread 3 round tbsp butter, 1/3  - 1/2 cup white sugara and the grated rind of 1 orange.  Add orange rind and juice to cream cheese frosting.
Caramel Apple variation;  double dough recipe to make 24 rolls.  Combine 3/4 c brown sugar, 1/4 cup flour, 2 tsp cinnamon and 1/3 c softened butter.  Sprinkle onto dough.  Evenly sprinkle on 2 peeled and chopped apples.  Finish as for cinnamon rolls, but frost with caramel frosting.
Caramel Frosting:  Melt 1/2 cup butter in saucepan then add 1 cup brown sugar.  Bring to a low boil and stir for 2 minutes.  Add 1/2 c milk or half and half and bring back to a boil.  Remove from heat and beat in 2 - 4 cups powdered sugar and 1 tsp vanilla to desired consistency. Frost rolls.

recipes.name: Cinnamon Rolls- Deanne
recipes.instructions:
Melt butter in the microwave.  Warm the milk for about 1 min in the microwave.  Add the yeast and let it start to work.  Mix up the sugar, salt, melted butter and large egg in the mixer.  When yeast is ready add yeast mixture.   Add 1 Cup of flour and mix with beaters.  Change to a dough hook and add the last 2 cups of flour.  mix. 5-10 min.  Let rise to double about an hour.  Roll out in a rectangle and spread butter, brown sugar, white sugar and cinnamon on the dough.  roll it up and use a piece of thread to cut into rolls.  Lay out on tray and let rise for about 1/2 hour.  Cook for about 10 min. at 350 degrees.  
Frosting:
1 pkg Cream Cheese
1/4 C Margarine
2 tbsp hot water
1 tsp vanilla
2 1/2C - 4C (add to get right consistancy) Powder Sugar

recipes.name: Clam Chowder  Brattens's
recipes.instructions: Pour clam juice over vegetables. Add water to barely cover. Simmer about 20 minutes until potatoes are tender. Make white sauce. Add to undrained vegetables & clams heat through makes 8 servings.

recipes.name: Cocoa Molasses Moose Cookies
recipes.instructions: Sift dry ingredients together. Cream butter and sugar together. Add egg, molasses, and vanilla and beat until well mixed. Add dry ingredients a little at a time until well blended. Wrap dough and chill for 1 hour. Preheat oven to 350. Roll dough out on a lightly floured surface to about 1/8 inch thick. Dip cookie cutter in flour and cut out cookies. Put cookies on ungreased cookie sheets and bake for 8 to 10 minutes until almost firm. Remove cookies and cool on wire racks. Cool cookies completely before icing.

recipes.name: Cocoanut Cookies
recipes.instructions: Bake in 350 to 400 degree oven for about 15 minutes.

recipes.name: Coconut Cream Pie
recipes.instructions: In heavy saucepan combine sugar, cornstarch and salt. Slowly stir in milk. Cook and stir on medium high until it boils and thickens. Then stir and time 2 minutes longer. Remove from heat and stir a little hot mixture into yolks. Add all to hot mixture. Stir 2 minutes longer. Remove from heat. Add butter and vanilla. Pour into dish. Cover with saran wrap and cool to room temperature. Beat with spoon. Add coconut. Pour into baked pie crust. Top with meringue or cream. Same recipe can be used for banana cream, just substitute 1 banana cut up for the coconut.

recipes.name: Coffee Cake
recipes.instructions: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees. Combine vegetable oil, egg, and milk. Sift together dry ingredients; add to milk mixture; mix on medium speed until smooth. Pour into well greased 9x9x2 inch pan. Combine all of the ingredients for the spicy topping and then sprinkle them on the cake. Bake at 375 degress for about 25 minutes.

recipes.name: Cold Dill Pickles
recipes.instructions: Soak cucumbers in cold water overnight. Boil water then measure 3 qts. Water, 1 qt vinegar. Add one cup salt. Add garlic button in each bottle. Push dill weed into each bottle and seal.

recipes.name: Crab Dip
recipes.instructions: Heat first two ingredients until well blended and then put in fridge to cool. When cool add the rest of the ingredients and mix well.

recipes.name: Cranberry Nut Bread
recipes.instructions: Grease and flour 9x5x3 loaf pan. Bake at 350 for 60 minutes. Cool for 15 minutes. Remove from pan.

recipes.name: Cranberry Orange Cookies
recipes.instructions:
Glaze  1/2 tsp grated orange zest, 3 tbsp orange juice, 1 1/2 cups powdered sugar.  Stir until smooth.  
Preheat oven to 375 degrees.  Bake cookies for 12 minutes
Cream sugars and butter until smooth.  Add the egg.  Add zest and orange juice, add dry ingredients, cranberries and nuts.  Stir until blended.  Drop by rounded tsp on ungreased cookie sheets  (I lightly greased)

recipes.name: Cranberry Sauce
recipes.instructions: Boil all for 10 minutes

recipes.name: Cream Filled Cupcakes
recipes.instructions:
Preheat ove to 375 degrees.  Line cupcake pans with paper liners.  Mix dry ingredients and add wet ingredients all at once.  Stir well .  Fill muffin cups 1/2 full.  Bake 15 to 20 minutes. 
Filling:  Beat together 1/4 cup butter, 1/4 cup shortening,  2 cups confectioners sugar, 1 pinch salt, 3 tbsp milk, 1 tsp vanilla extract.  Beat until light and fluffy.  Fill a pastry bag with a small tip.  Push tip through bottom of paper liner to fill each cupcake.

recipes.name: Crepe Batter
recipes.instructions: Mix in blender. Refrigerate for at least 2 hours. Cook in butteed crepe pan. Put on wax paper. Stack in layers with wax paper between. Can be frozen

recipes.name: Crispie Cookies
recipes.instructions: Roll in balls. Bake at 400 for 10 minutes.

recipes.name: Crispy Treats With Peanut Butter
recipes.instructions: Combine first three ingredients in a saucepan. Cook until sugar is dissolved. Add rice crispies. Spread in buttered 9 x 13 pan. Spread melted chocolate on top.

recipes.name: Crostini With Olives And Feta Spread
recipes.instructions: Partially freeze bread. Cut forty 1/4 inch thick slices; arrange on baking sheets. Drain tomatoes, reserving oil. Lightly brush one side of each bread with oil. Bake in 300 oven for 6 minutes. Finely chop tomatoes. Stir in garlic and olives. In small mixing bowl beat cream cheese until softened. Beat in feta and milk until smooth. Spread mixture on bread and top with dollop of tomato mixture.

recipes.name: Crown Roast Of Pork With Wild Rice Stuffing
recipes.instructions: Have roast prepared with backbone an feather bones removed. This will make easier carving; have ribs frenched. Remove roast from refrigerator 1 hour befoe cooking and rub entire roast with sage, except rib ends. After this hour, place rost on trivet in bottom of dutch oven. Add 1/2 cup water and put on lid. Place 22 fresh coals on lid and 1 under perimeter of oven. Baste roast every 15-20 minutes with pan juices. Replenish water as needed. Do not allow oven to go dry as this will result in an unpleasant flavor from the sage. Move coals from under oven to lid every 20 minutes. Replace coals under oven with fresh coals. Cook for 1 hour. Now that the roast has sealed, season liberally with soy sauce and seasoning salt. Continue the basting and coal rotation for an additional 1 to 1 1/2 hours or until the internal temperature is 165-170 degrees. Meat should be slightly pink and the juices clear. Fill the crown with wild rice stuffing 1/2 hours before removing the roast from the oven.   for stuffing, combine rice and chicken broth in an 8-10 inch oven. Add enough coals to bring the mixture to a simmer. Simmer for about 20 minutes or until just tender brown sausage in an 8-10 inch oven.  Saute onion, until just clear; drain fat. Combine rice, sausage, onions,  mushrooms, celery and spices. A small amount of water may be necessary if all the broth was absorbed by the rice. Mixture should be moist but not soggy keep cool until ready to combine with roast.

recipes.name: Cucumber Pita Wedges
recipes.instructions: Beat cream cheese and salad dressing mix. Split pitas in half forming two circles. Spread cream cheese mixture over pitas. Cut each circle into six wedges. Top with cucumbers. Sprinkle with lemon pepper.

recipes.name: Danish Pastry Apple Bars

ingredients.ingredient: Egg Yolk Plus Milk To Make 2/3 C

recipes.instructions: Crust: mix dry ingredients and add the milk/egg mixture. Press 1/2 of the dough into a 9x13 pan.  filling: lay apples over dough in pan. Sprinkle with lemon juice. mix salt, cinnamon, sugar and flour and sprinkle evenly over apples. Dot with 3 tbsp butter.   roll out other half of dough and place over top. Brush with one egg white.

recipes.name: Donuts
recipes.instructions: Cook potatos and conserve potato water if desied for 1 cup lukewarm water. Combine shortening, sugar and mashed potatoes. Add scalded milk and let cool. Add yeast cake which has been dissolved lukewarm water. Add eggs and salt and beat well. Add 2 cups flour and beat well. Add 5 to 6 cups flour and knead thoroughly. Grease, cover and let rise one hour. Refrigerate over night. Or let rise two hours and cut out donuts let rise 45 minutes after cut out and then fry in deep oil at 375 degrees.  vanilla glaze: 1 cup boiling water 1 pound powdered sugar vanilla extract pinch of salt  chocolate glaze: 1 cup powdered sugar 1/4 cup milk 1 tsp vanilla 2 tbls butter 2 squares unsweetened chocolate

recipes.name: Double Chocolate M&M Cookies
recipes.notes: preheat to 350 cook 8 minutes.   mix dry ingred.  Beat butter and sugars until fluffy 3-4 min,  add beaten eggs just to combine.  With rubber spatula fold in dry mixture.  wrap and chill 30 min to 1 hour.  form dough into walnut size balls and flatten slightly  Place on parchment or pammed baking sheet.  Bake

recipes.name: Double Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies
recipes.instructions: Cream butter and sugar, add eggs, water and vanilla. Mix dry ingredients together adn add to creamed mixture. Drop dough onto parchment lined cookie sheets, about 2 inches apart. Makes about 8 dozen. Bake at 350 degrees for 10 - 12 minutes.   Makes about 96 cookies

recipes.name: Easy Bread Sticks
recipes.instructions: Add yeast to warm water. Add honey and let it start to rise. Mix with flour and salt. Knead and roll into pencil size pieces. Place on a greased cookie sheet and let rise 1/2 hour. Bake at 400 degrees for 12- 15 minutes. Brush with melted butter. Sprinkle with salad supreme or parmesan and savor salt.

recipes.name: Easy Carmel Corn
recipes.instructions: Boil until frothy looking over med. Heat

recipes.name: Easy Turkey Gravy
recipes.instructions: Blend in bowl 1 cup stock with flour until smooth. Heat remaining stock in large saucepan. Stir flour mixture into hot stock. Cook and stir over moderate heat until mixture thickens.

recipes.name: Easy Tv Carmels
recipes.instructions: Mix first 5 ingredients. Start on low heat, stir to mix, then slowly bring to a rapid boil. Stirring constantly, boil 15 minutes. Add vanilla and nuts. Pour into buttered 9x13 pan. Let set and cut into small pieces and wrap in plastic wrap. To make your own sweetened condensed milk: 1/2 cup warm water 1 cup and 2 tbls instant milk 3/4 cup sugar

recipes.name: El Dorado Beef And Cheese
recipes.instructions: Brown meat; drain and add garlic salt, tomato sauce, onions and olives. In a seperate bowl combine: sour cream, cottage cheese and green chilies.  Layer half of the chips, meat mixture, sour cream mixture and cheese. Repeat layers, ending with cheese. Cover and bake at 350 for 35 minutes. Yields 8-10 servings

recipes.name: Flan Cake
recipes.notes: Measure ingredients scantly so it doesn't overflow in the oven
recipes.instructions: Scald milk, add butter. In lage bowl, beat eggs until light y ellow add sugar and vanilla. Beat until light and fluffy. Sift together flour, powder and salt. Add to liquid mixture. Stir gently. Pour into generously greased and floured  flan pan. Bake for 25 minutes at 350 degrees. Cool 5 mn. Dump out.

recipes.name: French Bread, Marilee's
recipes.instructions: Dissolve yeast in warm water. Beat all with 3 cups flour. Add yeast. Beat well. Add remaining flour. Let raise 10 minutes. Beat down. Repeat 4 more times. Shape two loaves. Let rise. Bake at 400 degrees for 30 minutes. Brush top with egg whites.

recipes.name: French Chocolate
recipes.instructions: Combine chocolate and water in saucepan; cook over low heat, stirring until chocolate melts and mixture is blended. Add sugar and salt; boil 4 minutes, stirring constantly. Cool, fold in whipped cream and chill. To serve. Spoon 1 rounded tablespoon chocolate mixture into each cup of hot milk. Stir to blend and garnish with cinnamon if desired.

recipes.name: Fruit Cake

ingredients.ingredient: Raisins, Nuts, Dates, And Fruit Mix

recipes.instructions: Bake 1 hour and 15 minutes in a slow oven.

recipes.name: Fruit Cocktail

ingredients.ingredient: Sugar Sprinkle On Peaches And Let Stand

recipes.instructions: Mix together. Put in bags or containers and freeze. Best when served slightly frozen.

recipes.name: Fruit Cocktail Cake
recipes.instructions: Heat oven to 350.  Beat eggs and white sugar.  Add dry ingredients and fruit cocktail. Sprinkle brown sugar on top.   Bake in a greased 9x13 pan 35 to 40 min.

recipes.name: Fruit Dip
recipes.instructions: Cream together in blender. Serve with fresh fruit.

recipes.name: Fruit Dip,Fresh
recipes.instructions: Mix together spices, salt & sugar then stir into sour cream. Add vanilla and stir well. Cover and chill at least hours to allow flavors to blend. Servewith fresh fruit.

recipes.name: Fruit Pizza
recipes.instructions: Mix ingredients for glaze. Cook over medium heat until boils and thickens, then cool. Spread cookie dough on buttered pizza pan. Bake at 350 fo 10 minutes. Cool. Mix sauce and spread over cooled dough. Arrange fruit on top and pour glaze over. Refrigerate.

recipes.name: Fruit Salad,Quick And Easy
recipes.instructions: Add jello to undrained pineaple tidbits in abowl. Stir until jello is dissolved and sets up. Stir in the rest of the ingredients. Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Fruit Shake

ingredients.ingredient: Vanilla Or Plain Yogurt Or Buttermilk

recipes.instructions: Combine in blender

recipes.name: Fruitpizza
recipes.notes: Use J. Jensen's sugar cookie recipe for crust
recipes.instructions: Bake crust. Cool. Add cream mixture. Arrange fruit. I cookes the cookie dough 9 min. In pie pans.

recipes.name: Fudge
recipes.instructions: Bring to a full boil over med. Heat. Boil 5 minutes. Remove from heat and add 1 package chocolate chips, 2 tsp vanilla and nuts if desired. Pour into 9x13 greased pan

recipes.name: Gingerbread Cake
recipes.instructions:
Cream sugar and butter together.  Add eggs and molasses.  Beat well.   Sift dry ingredients together and add to creamed mixture.   Add hot water and beat until smooth.  Pour into  
9 X 13 inch baking pan , greased well.  Bake 45 minutes in 350 degree F. oven or until it tests done.  Serve with sliced bananas and whipped cream.

recipes.name: Gingerbread Dough

ingredients.ingredient: Butter Or Margarine At Room Temperature

recipes.instructions: In large bowl beat butter and sugar until thoroughly mixed. Blend in salt, soda and spices. Stir in molasses and water. Add 4 cups flour; mix thoroughly. Stir in remaining flour, one cup at a time, until mixed and somewhat stiff. Divide in half; wrap in plastic wrap and chill 1 hour or more. Bake at 350 until done.

recipes.name: Gingersnaps
recipes.instructions: Roll into balls and roll in sugar. Lightly grease cookie sheet and bake at 325 for 8 to 10 minutes.

recipes.name: Golden Cashew Chicken
recipes.instructions: Flatten chicken pieces between two layers of plastic wrap to 1/8 inch thick. Marinate 1-2 hours. To make cheese sauce, slowly melt cream cheese, adding about 1/4 cup milk and garlic powder. Whisk until smooth. Add parmesan cheese. Heat until parmesan cheese melts. Grate the vegetables and mix with 1/2 cup creamy cheese sauce and cashews to makea paste. Spread vegetable mix on chicken breasts and sprinkle wiht 1-2 tablespoons of stuffing crumbs. Roll in jelly roll fashion; secure with wooden picks. Whip the egg; roll chicken in egg, then in stuffing crumb mixture. Brown chicken in lightly oiled 12 inch dutch oven. Cover and cook 25-30 minutes until chicken is tender, using 12 coals on top and 10- 12 coals on the bottom. To serve, arrange on plate, drizzle with cheese sauce mixed with remaining milk. You may thin the sauce to the desired consistency. Sprinkle with paprika and garnish as desired.

recipes.name: Grandma Mcmurray's Rolls
recipes.instructions: Mix in order given. It makes a sticky dough. Rise until double. Refrigerate overnight. Roll like jelly roll - butter roll. Roll up cut with string. Let rise until double. Bake at 400 for 10-15 minutes.

recipes.name: Grape Juice
recipes.instructions: Fill each quart jar with above and fill with hot water. Process for 20 minutes in a cold pack canner.

recipes.name: Green Bean Casserole

ingredients.ingredient: Frozen Cut Green Beans ,(2 ) 14.5 Oz Cns

recipes.instructions: In 1 1/2 qt casserole miz ll ingredients except 2/3 cup onions. Bake 30 minutes at 350 f or until hot; stir. Top with 2/3 cup onions. Bake 5 minutes or until golden.

recipes.name: Green Smoothies2
recipes.notes: Place spinach and water in a blender.  Process.  Add the rest of the ingredients
recipes.instructions: cups

recipes.name: Grenadine Slush
recipes.instructions: Freeze. Pour sprite over chunks in glasses.

recipes.name: Grog
recipes.instructions: Combine first four ingredients and boil 5 minutes. Then add the next three ingredients. Heat to serve.

recipes.name: Gumdrops (Christmas)
recipes.instructions: Line a 9x13 loaf pan with foil. Butter foil and set aside. Butter sides of heavy saucepan. Combine 1 cup sugar and corn syrup. Cook over medium- high heat until boiling, stirring constantly with wooden spoon until sugar dissolves. Cook, stirring occasionaly until until thermometer reads 280. Meanwhile in a heavy 2 quart saucepan combine water, pectin, and baking soda. Mixture will be foamy. Cook over high heat to boiling. Remove from heat and set aside. When sugar mixture reaches soft crack stage remove from heat. Return pectin mixture to heat and cook until it begins to simmer. Gradually pour hot sugar mixture in thin stream into boiling pectin. Cook for a minute more. Remove saucepan from heat. Add desired flavorings and color. orange: 2 tsp orange extract cinnamon: 5 drops oil of cinnamon mint: 1 tsp mint extract lemon: 2 tsp lemon extact pour mixture into pan and cool. Cut and roll in sugar.

recipes.name: HERSHEY'S RICH COCOA FUDGE
recipes.instructions: FIND IN ALLRECIPES.COM  wE USED FOR FUDGE EASTER EGGS IN 2003

recipes.name: Halibut Au Gratin
recipes.instructions: Salt fish and steam over boiling water. Blend butter and flour. Add milk and stir until creamy and well blended. Add at the time you add the milk,  a bay leaf and a 1 inch piece of cheese cut from a 2 lb block of velveta cheese. Salt and pepper to taste. Pour over fish and into a casserole dish. Top with soda cracker crumbs and bake at 350 until heated through.

recipes.name: Ham Crepes
recipes.instructions: Mix together sour cream, onions, mustard, salt, pepper, and cheese. Spread over crepes. Add thin slice of ham and roll up. Place in baking dish and sprinkle with bread crumbs and melted butter. Bake in 350 degree oven for 20 to 30 minutes.

recipes.name: Harvest Cookies
recipes.instructions: Beat together oil, egg, and squash. Add flour, baking powder & spices. Beat well, stir in dates. Drop batter by teaspoonfuls onto lightly greased baking sheets. Bake at 350 degress for 10 minutes or until firm to touch.

recipes.name: Hawaiian Chicken Stir Fry
recipes.notes: froaen
recipes.instructions: Stir fry chicken in oil. Add broccoli. Make sauce with the remaining ingredients. Serve over the noodles

recipes.name: Hawaiian Cobb Salad
recipes.instructions: Drain pineapple. Prepare cobb dressing. Pour over pineapple chunks and chill 1 hour or longer. Shortley before serving, place lettuce in a shallow dish. Arrange remaining ingredients over lettuce and top with pineapple chunks and dressing. Toss together and serve.  dressing: mix all ingredients together. Cover and shake well to blend.

recipes.name: Hawaiian Haystacks
recipes.instructions: Make a bed of rice and noodles, layer other ingredients and cover with gravy

recipes.name: Hello Dollies
recipes.instructions: Combine first two ingredients to form crust. Layer ingredients in a 9x13 pan in the order given. Bake at 350 for 30 minutes.

recipes.name: Hilda Cookies

ingredients.ingredient: Red Jelly Or Good Red Jam

recipes.instructions: Place four, butter, sugar and egg on bread boad and cut in butter until dough is forming. Then start kneading with your hands until the dough is smooth. Put in refrigerator for about 1 hour. Roll out dough rather thinly, cut out round discs about 3". Punch hole in the center using of half of the discs using a thimble. Put all discs on a greased cookie sheet. Bake in pre-heated oven at medium heat for about 20 minutes. Spread red jelly on top of cookies without holes. Sprinkle cookies with holes with confectioner's sugar and place on top of other cookies.

recipes.name: Homemade Root Beer
recipes.instructions: Combine and stir until well carbonated.  variation: fill two gallon bottles with the mixture, add water, and set in warm place for 4 or 5 hours.

recipes.name: Hong Kong Hamburgers
recipes.instructions: Combine ground beef, egg, salt and pepper. Cut loaf of french bread in half lengthwise, reserve top half for another use. Butter bottom half, spread with meat mixture to edge. Broil until brown, about 8-10 minutes. Combine pineapple syrup, cornstarch, brown sugar, wine vinegar, and worchestershire sauce. Cook stirring until thickened. Remove loaf from broiler, brush with glaze, add pineapple, green pepper, remaining glaze. Broil for 2 more minutes.

recipes.name: Hot Chicken Casserole
recipes.instructions: Mix chicken, eggs, onions, rice (don't over mix). Set aside. Combine remaining ingredients and mix with first mixture. Spoon into a 9x13 pan. Sprinkle with buttered bread crumbs or crushed potato chips. Bake at 350 for 30 minutes.

recipes.name: Hot Chicken Salad
recipes.instructions: Mix first set of ingredient and bake in ungreased 9x13 pan for 15 minutes at 450 degrees. Mix in second set of ingredients with first and heat to serving. Top with crushed potato chips if desired.

recipes.name: Hot Cross Buns
recipes.instructions: Cream yeast with 1 tbls each of sugar and flour until it turns to liquid.  Add lukewarm milk; mix well. Cover and stand in a warm place for 15 minutes or until the mixture looks frothy. Mix butter with spices. Add egg, yellow raisins and yeast mixture; beat well. Let stand for 40 minutes or until double in bulk. Punch down dough, knead until smooth. Divide dough up to make 12 to 15 buns. Knead each piece of dough into a round shape. Put buns in a lightly greased 9x13 inch pan. Cover and let rise for about 15 more minutes. Mix flour and water to form dough for cross. Put in piping bag and pipe a cross on each risen bun. Bake buns in hot oven 200 degrees c for 20 minutes or until browned. Mix glaze and brush over hot buns. Remove buns from tin and cool.

recipes.name: Hot Water Chocolate Cake
recipes.instructions: Mix all together. Bake at 350 for 30 minutes.

recipes.name: Inside-Out Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.instructions: Heat oven to 350. Mix sugars, margarine, shortening, vanilla and eggs in large bowl. Stir in flour, cocoa, baking soda and salt. Stir in vanilla, chips and nuts. Drop dough by spoonfuls on ungreased cookie sheet. Bake 10 to 12 minutes.

recipes.name: Instant Hot Chocolate
recipes.instructions: Mix all together. Makes 5 quarts powder. Add 1/4 cup mix to 8 oz. Glass of hot water.

recipes.name: J. Jensen's Sugar Cookies
recipes.instructions: Cream sugar, shortening, eggs and flavoring. Sift in dry ingredients. Chill at least 1 hour. Roll about 1/4 inch thick. Bake at 350 for about 6-7 minutes.-on rack in top of oven

recipes.name: Jumbo Raisin Cookies
recipes.instructions: Boil raisins in water for 10 minutes and cool. Sift together dry ingredients. Cream sugar and shortening, add eggs adn vanilla. Bake on a greased cookie sheet at 350 for 12-15 minutes.

recipes.name: Knox Blox
recipes.instructions: Mix together first two ingredients and set aside. Boil next three ingredients. Cool for 15 minutes. Then mix both mixtures together and pour into 9x13 pan and set in fridge.

recipes.name: Lemon Bars
recipes.instructions: Cream butter and sugar; add flour. Spread in and 8x8 inch pan. Bake at 325 for 15-20 minutes. While crust is baking prepare the next layer. beat eggs slightly, add sugar, flour, and lemon juice. Mix well and pour over hot crust after it comes out from the oven. Bake for 15-20 minutes at 325. Remove from oven and sprinkle with powdered sugar. when doubled this recipe just fits into a 10x15 inch pan.

recipes.name: Lemon Bread
recipes.instructions: Heat oven to 350. Cream shortening and sugar until light and fluffy. Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each. Add salt and baking powder.  Add 1/3 cup milk and then 1/3 of the flour. Repeat twice more. Spoon into two greased loaf pans. As soon as the bread comes out of the oven spoon glaze over the loaf. Cool to room temperature before removing from the pan and slicing.

recipes.name: Lemon Cake
recipes.instructions: Mix together cake ingedients and beat well. Bake in 9x13 greased pan at 375 for 25 minutes or until done. Remove from oven and pierce top of cake with large fork. Frost immediately with frosting mixture.

recipes.name: Lemon Jello
recipes.instructions: Set jello with pineapple following instructions. Boil water, salt, sugar and cornstarch until thickened. Cool and mix in rinds and cool whip. Spread on jello and top with grated cheese.

recipes.name: Lemon Meringue Pie

ingredients.ingredient: Egg Whites; 6 Tbls One At A Time

recipes.instructions: Cover and cook first four ingredients for 10 minutes. Add egg yolks and sugar beaten together to the mixture. Cook all for 2 minutes. Add margarine and lemon juice and cool to room temperature. Beat egg whites, add sugar one tbls at a time bake for 15-20 minutes at 350.

recipes.name: Lemon Zucchini Cookies
recipes.instructions: Cream butter and sugar, add eggs, lemon peel, zucchini and chopped pecans. Sift dry ingredients together and add to mixture, mixing well. Bake at 375 from 8-10 minutes. Glaze while hot and top with a pecan half.   makes about 4 dozen.

recipes.name: Light Lemon Cheesecake
recipes.instructions: Dissolve jello in boiling water. Add next two ingredients. Whip the half frozen milk. Beat the softened cream cheese and sugar. Fold all together.  Crush vanilla wafers and add 1/2 to the bottom of a 9 x 13 pan. Pour in mixture. Sprinkle on th rest of the crumbs. Chill at least 3 hours.

recipes.name: Lion House Dinner Rolls
recipes.instructions: Combine yeast and water. Let stand for 5 minutes. Add sugar, shortening, salt, dry milk, 2 cups flour and egg. Beat together until very smooth. Add 2 more cups flour, one at a time, and beat until smooth. Add about one more cup flour, 1/2 cup at a time until well mixed in. Turn dough onto lighly floured surface and knead until smooth and satiny. Place dough in greased bowl, turning once to grease the surface of the dough. Let rise until triple in bulk. (in a cool oven with a pan of hot water on a rack below is a good place.) use the last of the flour as needed on the board for rolling out the dough. Let dough rest on the board for 10 minutes so that it is easier to roll out. Place rolls on greased baking sheet. Brush surface with melted butter. Let rise in a warm place until ready for oven (about 1 1/2 hours). Bake at 400 degrees for about 15 minutes.

recipes.name: Lion House Taffy
recipes.instructions: Mix sugar, water, corn syrup, salt and glycerine in heavy saucepan. Bring to a boil and cook to 258 degrees. Remove from heat and let stand for two or three minutes. Then add vanilla and butter and stir vigorously until butter is melted. Pour into buttered cookie sheet. Cool until lukewarm taffy can be handled. Pull taffy until it turns white.

recipes.name: Luscious Lasagne
recipes.instructions: Cook spinach and drain. Brown ground beef and pork sausage. Add salt, pepper, oregano and worchestershire sauce. Stir in chopped spinach. Cook lasagna noodles as directed on package. Drain and rinse. In two greased 9x13 inch pans arrange 3 layers of noodles, meat mixture and cheese. Combine soup and milk; heat until well blended. Pour over the tops of the casseroles. Spread tomato sauce over the top then sprinkle generously with parmesan cheese. Bake at 350

recipes.name: Mango Fruit Parfait
recipes.instructions: Put mangoes and orange juice in blender and puree. Slice 20 of the strawberries. Line the bottoms of four wine glasses with the sliced strawberries. Pour a thin layer of the mango puree over each. Reserving four kiwi slices, layer the rest. Divide the remaining mango puree into the glasses. Top each with a slice of kiwi surrounded by raspberries make a slit in each of the four strawberries and attach to rim of glass. Refirgerate for at least 15 minutes.

recipes.name: Manicotti
recipes.instructions: Cook manicotti shells in boiling water according to package directions. In a medium bowl, combine ricotta cheese, eggs, parmesan cheese and parsley flakes. Blend well. Stuff into cooked manicotti shells. Preheat on to 350. Place 1 cup of italian meat sauce mix in bottom of a 13"x9" baking dish. Place stuffed manicotti shells on top of sauce. Pour remaining sauce over teh top of the shells. Sprinkle with romano and parmesan cheese, for garnish. Cover with foil and bake 30 minutes, until heated through.  *italian meat sauce 1 lb. Mild italian sasauge, peeled and crumbled 2 lbs. Lean ground beef 4 teaspoons salt 1/4 teaspoon pepper 1/2 tsp instant minced garlic 1 small onion 1 carrot, peeled water 2 tbs. Sweet basil leaves 1/4 tsp chili powder 1/4 tsp thyme 1 (10 oz) package frozen cauliflower 1 (10 oz) package frozen broccoli 1 (29 oz) can tomato puree 1 (12 o) can tomato paste 8 cups water  brown meats and seasons. Put carrots and onion in blender, cover with water and blend. Drain water. Add all ingredients together. Bring to a boil. Simmer 8 hours.

recipes.name: Marinade For Beef
recipes.instructions: Combine all. Marinate meat for three days. ( iused this on round steak for fajitas. I marinatd the neat abiut three hours, and cut down the anount of dry mustard, black pepper and cloves. I also substituted dry parsley.) suggested use chuck roast and shish kebobs

recipes.name: Marinade For Steak
recipes.instructions: least two to three hours.f1

recipes.name: Marshmallow Easter Eggs
recipes.instructions: Soften gelatin in cold water. pour in boiling water. Stir until dissolved. Add sugar, salt stir on low heat until dissolved. Remove from heat and beat in lg. bowl of electric mixer until thick .  Pour into molds made of flour.

recipes.name: Marshmallow Easter Eggs
recipes.instructions: Soften gelatin in cold water. pour in boiling water. Stir until dissolved. Add sugar, salt stir on low heat until dissolved. Remove from heat and beat in lg. bowl of electric mixer until thick .  Pour into molds made of flour.

recipes.name: Meat Swirl
recipes.instructions: Combine and blend all ingredients, then flatten meat out in a 1/3 inch thick rectangle between layers of wax paper. Spread bread dressing on top of meat, then roll up like a jelly roll. Bake in a shallow pan at 350 for 45 minutes. Let cool for 20 minutes before serving.  bread dressing instructions: add onion to melted fat and cook until tender. Add celery and broth. Remove from heat, cool 10 minutes. Add the bread crumbs and other ingredients. The moisture depends on how dry the bread is. Add additional water if needed.

recipes.name: Melt Aways
recipes.instructions: Beat butter until soft. Add next 3 ingredients and stir until well mixed.  Drop from teaspoon. Bake at 350 for 10-12 minutes. Cool and frost.

recipes.name: Mexican Bean Salad

ingredients.ingredient: Chili Powder, 1 Dash Hot Pepper Sauce

recipes.instructions:
Combine beans, peppers, corn
Mix remaining ingredients into a dressing
Pour over vegetables; mix well.  Chill thoroughly and serve cold.

recipes.name: Moon Cookies
recipes.instructions: Mix ingredients together with hands. Roll in balls. Press pecan halves if desired. Bake at 350 for 10 minutes

recipes.name: Muffins Poppy Seed
recipes.notes: mix as for  muffins - liquid over dry ingred.  add poppy seeds.  Bake in regular muffin tin (12) .  400 degrees 18-20 min.  Cool and glaze.

ingredients.preparation: + Zest Rubbed Into Sugar If Desired

recipes.instructions:
sugar
baking

recipes.name: Mustard Pickle
recipes.instructions: Soak Cauliflower, cucumbers, onions in salt water overnight.  Rinse and drain.  Mix mustard and vinegar.,  Add vegetables and cook 1/2 hour.  Mix the rest of the ingredients in a bowl, Add to vegetable mixture and cook until it thickens.  Seal in hot jars.

recipes.name: Nancy's Tomato Soup
recipes.instructions: Drop whole tomatoes in boiling water abd remove skins before proceeding. Tie spices in a small cloth bag for easy removal later. Quarter tomatoes,  add sugar, water, salt, spices, onions, celery, parsley and bring to a boil. Simmer for 1 1/2 to 2 hours. Put in colander or osterizer. Brown bacon and crumble in. Add butter. Thicken with flour. Put a dollop of sour cream in when you serve and sprinkle with melted cheese if desired.

recipes.name: Neimann Marcus Cookies
recipes.instructions: Measure oatmeal and blend in a blender to fine powder. Cream butter with both sugars. Add eggs and vanilla. Mix in flour, oatmeal, salt, baking powder and soda. Add chocolate chips, hershey bar and nuts. Roll into balls and place two inches apart on a cookie sheet. Bake for 10 minutes at 375

recipes.name: Never Fail Pie Crust
recipes.instructions: Blend together flour, shortening and salt until the mixture resembles small peas. Slightly beat egg and blend in vinegar and water. Combine the liquid with flour mixture until thoroughly blended.

recipes.name: No Fail Fudge
recipes.instructions: Put in microwave on high for 2 minutes. Stir quickly pour into 9x9 buttered pan. Cool and cut into squares.

recipes.name: Oatmeal Cake
recipes.instructions: Pour boiling water over oats, add margarine and let stand until melted. Add eggs and remaining ingredients. (1 c. Dates or raisins may also be added). Bake for 40 minutes at 325 in a glass pan. Spread topping over hot cake and put under broiler until brown.

recipes.name: Oatmeal Cookies

ingredients.ingredient: Sour Milk (Add Lemon Juice To Milk)

recipes.instructions: Sift first five ingredients. Cream shortening and sugar, add eggs; beat until smooth. Add dry ingredients in small amounts alternatively with milk. Stir in last three ingredients. Drop by teaspoonsful onto greased cookie sheets. Bake at 350 until golden.

recipes.name: Oatmeal Sandwich Cookies
recipes.instructions: Bake at 350 about 10 min.

recipes.name: Oatmeal, Instant Ben Alley
recipes.notes: to prepare  Add 1 cup water to 2/3 cup oatmeal.  Microwave on high for 90 seconds.  Add water to desired consistency.

recipes.name: Old Time Beef Stew
recipes.instructions: Slowly brown beef cubes (about 20 minutes). Add next ten ingredients and simmer for about 2 hours. Add potatoes and carrots and cook for about 30 minutes, until tender.

recipes.name: Onion Roasted Chicken And Veggies
recipes.notes: From Janelle - very well liked and easy
recipes.instructions:
Preheat oven to 450 degrees,  In alarge plastic bag or bowl, all all ingredients,  close bag and shake, or toss in bowl, until chicken and veggies are evenly coated.  In a 9 x 13 pan, arrange chicken and veggies, discard bag,  
Bake uncovered for 45 minutes.

recipes.name: Ooey Gooey Lemon Blueberry Cake
recipes.notes: Combine first four ingredients for cake crust.  Rinse and spread blueberries over crust.  With electric mixer combine filling ingredients.  Add powdered sugar last.  Pour over cake mixture and spread evenly.  Bake at 350 degrees in a 9 x 13 pan for 60 min.  It wshould remain a little gooey in the center.  Cool completely and cut into squares.

recipes.name: Orange Salad
recipes.instructions: Dissolve jello and add orange juice, mandarine orange, crushed pineapple,  marshmellows and fold in whipped cream. Set in mold and refrigerate until firm.

recipes.name: Orange Sherbet
recipes.instructions: Mix all together and refrigerate for 2 hours. Add two quarts milk to mixture and freeze in ice cream maker. Makes 5 quarts. Lime kool-aid works well also.

recipes.name: Orzo Salad

ingredients.ingredient: Orzo, Cooked  Rinse In Cold Water

recipes.instructions:
Dressing:  1/4 c olive oil, 1/2 c orange juice or juice of one orange, 1/4 c sugar, 1/2 tsp grd. mustard, 1 tbsp dry italian dressing mix.  Pour over before serving.  8-10 servings as a side dish.  
Australia: Dry Italian dressing mix is not available, so I used fat free Italian dressing, added fresh orange juice, 2 tbsp sugar and 1/2 tsp prepared mustard.  I also sprinkled some olive oil over the risotto pasta. I cooked about 250 g of pasta.  I used about 1/3 jar (450g) sliced olives.  I used 2 bags of spinach from Safeway.

recipes.name: Pan Gravy
recipes.instructions: Scrape meat particles off the bottom of the pan. Keep drippings in the pan. Mix flour with water or turkey broth until smooth. Quickly pour mixture into warm drippings and stir until thickened.

recipes.name: Pancake Mix, Hearty
recipes.instructions: Coarseley blend oats in a blender. In a bowl, add all ingredients. Divide into two, and place each in a bag. To seve combine 1 bag mix , 1 2/3 cup waer, 1 egg, 3 tbsp. Vegetable oil. Stir until just moist, then cook. Each bag makes about 18 pancakes.

recipes.name: Pancakes, Blender
recipes.instructions:
Combine wheat and 1 cup of milk in blender.  Blend on high for 1 minue.  Add remaining ingredientss and blend until smooth.  Cook on hot griddle,  Serve with favorite toppping.
                       
                             Dry milk may be substituted.  Add 4 Tbsp non-instant milk or 1/2 cup instant milk powder to wheat.  Then use the same proportion water as called for with fresh milk.

recipes.name: Paradise Potatoes
recipes.instructions: Cook, peal and grate potatoes; add sour cream. Grate cheese and chop onions; blend in. Add milk, salt and peper, stiring to distribute thoughout potatoes and press into oven. Smooth top surface and sprinkle on butter bread crumb mixture. Bake in a 12-inch oven with 10 coals and bottom and 12-14 coals on top, about 35-45 minutes. Makes 10 to 12 servings.

recipes.name: Parmesan Cheese Rolls
recipes.instructions: Combine yeast, water and sugar in large bowl let stand until foamy, about 5 minutes. Add oil, salt and egg. Combine dry milk with 2 cups of flour and add to liquid mixture. Beat until smooth add flour, 1 cup at a time. Mix until smooth and satiny. Place in oiled bowl, turning dough over to coat all surfaces. Cover bowl with damp towel and set in warm place. Allow dough to rise until double, about 1 hour. Punch down down. Let rest for 5 minutes. Melt butter in small bowl. Put cheese in second small bowl. Line bottom of a 14 inch dutch oven with parchment paper. Form dough into ball the size of an egg. Dredge in butter, then cheese, and place in the dutch oven about 1/4 to 1/2 inch apart. Place lid on oven and set in warm place to raise. If the weather is cool, place 3 coals under and 3 coals on top of oven. Allow dough to double or rise until dough covers the bottom of the oven. Place 10 fresh coals under the oven and 15 coals on top. Cooking time should be 15-20 minutes. Rolls are done when they sound hollow when tapped with a finger. Makes 20-24 rolls.

recipes.name: Parmesan Chicken
recipes.instructions: Melt butter dip chicken and then in cheese crumb mixture, makes about 4 servings bake for 20 mintes at 400

recipes.name: Pasta Salad Primavera (Shannon)

ingredients.preparation: Chopped Or 1 Tsp Dried Basil, Crushed

recipes.instructions: Cook Pasta, add Broccoli the last two minutes.  Drain and rinse with cold water.  Combine all ingredients with the dressing and add salt and pepper.

recipes.name: Pasta Salad Primavera (Shannon)

ingredients.preparation: Chopped Or 1 Tsp Dried Basil, Crushed

recipes.instructions: Cook Pasta, add Broccoli the last two minutes.  Drain and rinse with cold water.  Combine all ingredients with the dressing and add salt and pepper.

recipes.name: Peach Jam
recipes.instructions: Cook for 15 minutes after it comes to a rolling boil. Then add the four packages of jello. Remove from heat, bottle and seal with wax.

recipes.name: Peach Stone Jelly
recipes.instructions: Cover stones with water. Boil. Drain off 3 1/2 cups of juice. Add sugar. Use pectin pkg as directed.

recipes.name: Peanut Brittle
recipes.instructions: Boil first 3 ingredients to soft ball stage. Add next two ingredients and boil until brown, almost to hard crack stage. Remove from heat and add vanilla and soda.

recipes.name: Peanut Butter & Jelly Sandwiches
recipes.notes: A holiday favorite. Martha Steward recommends serving on Christmas Eve
recipes.instructions: Wipe peanut butter on one slice of bread wipe jelly (or jam) on other slice of bread put slices of bread together with jelly and peanut butter facing each other (take care to not face peanut butter and jelly toward outside) cut sandwich diagonally for extra savory flavor enjoy

recipes.name: Peanut Butter Balls
recipes.instructions: Mix until all the white is gone.

recipes.name: Peanut Butter Bars
recipes.instructions: Mix, spread into a greased 9x13 pan. Bake at 350 for 20-22 minutes.

recipes.name: Peanut Butter Caramel Bars
recipes.instructions: In a mixing bowl, combine the dry cake mix, butter, egg; beat until no longer crumbly, about 3 minutes. Stir in the peanut butter cups. Press into a greased 13x9x2 in. Baking pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 18-22 minutes or until lightly browned. Meanwhile, ina saucepan, combine cornstarch, caramel topping and peanut butter until smooth. Cook over low heat, stirring occassionally, until mixture comes to a boil, about 25 minutes. Cook and stir 1-2 minutes longer. Remove from the heat; stir in peanuts. Spread evenly over warm crust. Bake 6-7 minutes longer until almost set. Cool completely on a wire rack. Spread with frosting; sprinkle with peanuts. Refrigerate for at least 1 hour before cutting. Store in the refrigerator for at least 1 hour before cutting.

recipes.name: Peanut Butter Crisscross Cookies!!
recipes.instructions: Cream sugars, shortening, eggs and vanilla. Add peanut butter, then dry ingredients. Drop by rounded tsp on ungreased cookie sheet. Press with the back of a fork to make criss-crosses. Bake at 350 for about 10 minutes.

recipes.name: Pecan Pie
recipes.instructions: Brown butter in sauce pan. In separate bowls mix corn syrup, sugar, eggs,  lemon juice, vanilla & salt. Blend in browned butter. Roll pecans in cinnamon to coat them well and then line the pie shell with them. Pour mixture over pecans. Bake at 425 for 10 minutes then turn oven down to 325 and bake for 40-50 minutes.

recipes.name: Pecan Squares
recipes.instructions:
Preheat oven to 350. Grease jelly roll pan. Mix first set of ingredients until crumbly. Press firmly in pan and bake until light golden brown, about 20 minutes. filling: mix all ingredients except pecans until well blended stir in pecans. Pour over baked layer. Bake for about 25 minutes.Pecan squares using Sue Hales Pecan Pie Filling.  Make the cookie crust with the first four ingredients above.  Coarsely chop 2 1/2 Cups pecans.  Place in a ziploc and sprinkle to coat with cinnamon, sift off excess.
Use 1/2 c butter, 1 c white corn syrup, 1 cup sugar, 3 large eggs, beaten, 1/2 tsp vanilla, dash of salt to make filling.  Brown butter, combine other ingredients . Sue's recipe mentions lemon juice.

recipes.name: Pickled Beets
recipes.instructions: Boil and skin beets, pack in bottles and pour hot syrup over. Seal bottles. Makes 2 qts and 1 pt.

recipes.name: Pie Crust
recipes.instructions: Sift flour with salt and then cut in shortening into small particles. Toss lightly with milk and form into dough.

recipes.name: Pineapple Cookies
recipes.instructions: Bake at 350 for 15 minutes. Yields 4 dozen.

recipes.name: Pineapple Cookies (Two)
recipes.instructions: Drop on greased cookie sheet. Bake at 400 for 10 minutes

recipes.name: Pineapple Grapefruit
recipes.instructions: Mix fruit and juices with boiled syrup. Put into pan and place in the freezer for several hours until frozen. When ready to serve put chunks of frozen mixture into glass and pour gingerale (or sprite) over it. Serves about 25 and can be kept for several weeks in the freezer.

recipes.name: Pizza Crust
recipes.instructions: Scald milk, stir in sugar, salt and shortening. Cool to lukewarm. While this cools add yeast to warm water and let stand until dissolved. Then stir and add to lukewarm milk mixture. Add flour gradually, beating with a fork. Knead it a little with floured hands. Add more flour if sticky, but don't get teh dought too stiff. Grease pans and spread the dough thin on pan with greased hands. Put on toppings and bake at 425 degrees for about 20 minutes. Makes two cookie sheet size pizzas.

recipes.name: Plain Cookies
recipes.instructions: Sift together dry ingredients. Crumb in the shortening. Add sugar, eggs, vanilla. Add enough milk to make a soft dough. Bake at 350 for about 10 minutes.

recipes.name: Poor Man's Cake
recipes.instructions: Boil raisins in water. Save 3/4 cup water, drain and cool raisins. Cream sugar and shortening. Add egg. Add dry ingredients. Dissolve soda in 3/4 cup water and add to mixture. Spread on greased cookie sheet (1 in. Deep) . Bake at 350 from 30 minutes. Frost with powdered sugar, water, and butter frosting while the cookies are hot and cut into squares.

recipes.name: Poppy Seed Bundt Cake
recipes.instructions: Beat on med. 2 min. Add poppy seeds. Pour in greased and floured pan bake at 350 fo 48-52 min. Cool 10 min. Invert

recipes.name: Poppy Seed Cake
recipes.instructions: Mix according to directions on cake. Pour batter into large greased bundt pan bake for 45 minutes at 350.

recipes.name: Pork Chops, Slow Cooked
recipes.instructions: Dredge prk chops in lightly seasoned flour. I think you might add rubbed sage. Brown in hot oil. Place in a crock pot. Cook 8 -10 hours.

recipes.name: Potato Pan Rolls
recipes.instructions:
In a mixing bowl, combine 2 c flour, sugar, yeast and salt   In a saucepan heat water and butter to 120 to 130 degrees.  Add  to dry ingredients;  beat until smooth.  Stir in mashed potatoes and enough remaining flour to form a soft dough.  Turn onto a floured surface.  knead until smooth and elastic, about 6 - 8 min.  Cover and let rest 10 minutes.  Divide into 16 pieces, Shape each into a ball.  Place in two greased 8 or 9 in round baking pans .  Cover and let rise in a warm place until doubled, about 30 minutes.  Sprinkle with additional flour.  Bake at 400 degrees for 18 - 22 minutes or until golden brown.  Remobe from pans to wire rackes to cool.
s

recipes.name: Potato Salad
recipes.instructions: Boil potatoes in their skins. Salt the water. Boil eggs. Cube potatoes, chop eggs and onions. Make dressing and pour over potatoes while they are hot. Note: to the dressing i like to add 1 tsp. Dry mustard adn 1 tsp. Celery seed.

recipes.name: Potatoes In Whipping Cream
recipes.instructions: Grate potatoes and soak in cold water.  Drain. Layer in 3 - 4 layers in a 9x 13 pyrex baking dish.  Sprinkle salt on each layer as it is added.  (I sprinkle from the salt box)  Pour whipping cream over all the topof the dish and then milk.   Press the potatoes down so the liquid is even.  Bake at 325 for 1 1/2 hours or 300 for 2 hrs.

recipes.name: Pretty Ham Pinwheels
recipes.instructions: In a mixing bowl, beat the cream cheese, garlic, curry and mustard. Stir in apple. Spread about 2 tablespoons over each tortilla. Layer with the red pepper, onions and ham. Roll up tightly and wrap in plastic wrap. Refrigerate for at least 2 hours. Cut in 1 inch slices.

recipes.name: Pumpkin Apple Gingerbread
recipes.instructions: Combine dry ingredients. Cream butter and sugar. Add eggs one at a time. Add pumpkin, molasses, adn apple. Beat well. Combine all. Mix until well blended. Spoon into a greased and floured 12 cup bundt pan. Bake at 350 for 1 hour. Cool 15 minutes in pan. Dust iwth confectioners sugar, serve warm with hard sauce. Hard sauce: 2 sticks softened butter 4 c. Confectioners sugar 2 tsp. Vanilla beat until smooth. May use lemon sauce.

recipes.name: Pumpkin Apple Streusel Muffins
recipes.instructions:
Topping    2 tbsp flour, 1/4 cup white sugar, 1/2 tsp ground cinnamon, 4 tsp butter.   
    Directions: 1. Pre-heat oven to 350 degrees.  Prepare muffin pans.
                     2. Combine dryingredients.  Combine wet ingredients. Stir together just to moisten.
                         Add apples.  Put in muffin tins
                     3.  Mix  topping  Spoon onto muffins   Bake at 350 20 min or until done.

recipes.name: Pumpkin Bars-Cream Cheese Frosting
recipes.notes: Bake in 9 X 13, 350 degree oven, 30 minutes.    Combine wet ingredients,  Measure dry ingredients and add to mixture

recipes.name: Pumpkin Bread
recipes.notes: 2-16 - It took 43- 45 minutes at 360 degrees to bake 10 small loaves.  (four loaf pan, two small metal and aluminum foil pans- 4)
recipes.instructions: Mix in order given. Bake in greased bread pans (3 small) at 350 degrees for 1 hour. Let cool in the pans a few minutes before removing. Freezes well.

recipes.name: Pumpkin Cake
recipes.instructions: Cream sugar and shortening. Add eggs, one at a time, beating after each. Add pumkin and mix well. Add dry ingredients. Bake at 375 for about 45 minutes. Good also baked in layers adn frosted with caramel frosting.

recipes.name: Pumpkin Cookies
recipes.instructions: Drop heaping teaspoons onto a greased baking sheet. Bake at 350 for 15 minutes.   lemon icing: 2 c. Powdered sugar 1 tbsp. Lemon juice enough cream to be of spreading consistency

recipes.name: Pumpkin Pie
recipes.instructions: Warm milk. Beat eggs well. Mix all ingredients together and pour into unbaked pie crust. Bake for 10 minutes at 425 and 30 minutes at 325. Fills two nine inch pies with some left for tarts.

recipes.name: Ra-Ta-Ta
recipes.instructions: Layer veggies in a deep pan. Sprinkle alternate layers with spices. Drizzle with both oils. Chill overnight. Bake covered in 325 oven for 3 hours or longer.

recipes.name: Raspberry Pinwheels
recipes.instructions: Heat oven to 350. Cream first four ingredients. Add flour, mix well. If dough is too stiff add a little water. Roll dough about 1/8 inch thick. Cut into 2 1/2 inch squares. Transfer squares to a cookie sheet with a spatula. Cut the squares diagonally form each corner one inch toward the center. Place about 1/2 tsp raspberry jam in the center. Fold over every other point to make a pinwheel. Bake for about 7 minutes or until the tips are golden.

recipes.name: Raspberry-Banana Ice Cream
recipes.instructions: Pour sugar and hot water into into freezer can. Add other ingredients and enough milk to make freezer can 3/4 full. Follow icecream maker directions.

recipes.name: Raspberry/Apricot Jam
recipes.instructions: Boil the first three ingredients for 15-20 minutes; then add, the raspberry jello. Stir just until the jello disolves. Pour into jars and seal with wax.

recipes.name: Refrigerator  Rolls
recipes.instructions: Combine 1 cup warm milk or water with softened butter. Add sugar, salt, 1 c. Flour, 1/4 c. Water, instant yeast, 3 stirred eggs. Add remaining 3 1/2 c. Flour. Mix completely (dough is sticky) about 10 minutes in the Mixer. refrigerate at least 2 hours (overnight works great) take out and divide dough in half. Roll each half into circle about 12 to 14 inches. Spread melted butter on dough. Cut into 12 pie shaped pieces with pizza pie cutter, roll like a crescent roll. Spread more butter on top. Let raise about 2-3 hours. Bake at 400 degrees for 10 minutes - you can freeze after buttering tops, before baking. Allow about an extra hour to thaw and rise. Works great!

recipes.name: Rhubarb Pie
recipes.instructions: Fill pie crust with chopped rhubarb. Mix together remaining ingredients and pour over rhubarb, dot with butter and nutmeg. Bake at 350 for 1 hour.

recipes.name: Rice Ring
recipes.instructions: Combine & bake in 9x13 for 35 to 40 minutes at 350 degrees.   Originally this recipe was to be made in a ring mold.

recipes.name: Ritz Cracker Pie
recipes.instructions: Beat 3 egg whites until foamy. Add 1/2 tsp baking powder. Beat until stiff, adding 1 cup sugar slowly. Fold in 1/2 tsp vanilla, 2/3 chopped nuts and 14 crushed ritz crackers. Pour into pie pan. Bake for 30 minutes at 325 degrees, cool for two hours. Cover with whipped cream and grated chocolate.

recipes.name: Salad With Orzo   (Heather's)

ingredients.ingredient: (can Add Cooked, Diced Chicken For Main

recipes.instructions:
Dressing:    Mix 1/4 cup olive oil with 1/2 cup orange juice  or juice of one orange, 1/4 cup sugar, 1/2 tsp ground mustard,  
 1 tbsp dry italian dressing mix.  mix well.  Pour over salad just before serving

recipes.name: Salad, Mango
recipes.notes: Toss together first 10 ingredients and refrigerate for 30 min. to 3 hrs.  Top with bacon and your favorite dressing.  I like the homemade orange flavored dressing.

recipes.name: Salmon Loaf
recipes.instructions: Bake at 325 for 1 hour

recipes.name: Salsa, Nean's Fresh
recipes.instructions: Combine and enjoy with corn chips.

recipes.name: Sausage Egg Brunch
recipes.instructions: Layer croutons, sausage and cheese in greased 9x13 dish. Beat eggs well. Add milk and mustard. Mix well. Pour over sausage. Cover and refrigerate overnight. Bake at 375 for 45 minutes. Let stand 10 minutes before serving.

recipes.name: Sausage Sandwich Squares
recipes.instructions: In a bowl, combine 2 cups flour, yeast and salt.  Add warm water; mix well.  Add enough remaining flour to form a firm dough.  Turn onto a floured surface; knead until smooth and elastic, about 6 minutes.  Place in a greased bowl, turning once to grease top.  Cover and let rise in a warm place until doubled, about 50 minutes.  In skillet cook sausage until no longer pink; remove with a slotted spoon and set aside.  In the drippings, saute peppers and onions until tender; drain.   Press half of the dough onto the bottom and 1/2 in up the sides of a greased 15x10x1 inch baking pan.  Spread sausage evenly over the crust.  Top with peppers and onion.   Sprinkle with Mozzarella.  Roll out remaining dough to fit pan; place over cheese and seal the edges.   In a small bowl beat egg and water.  Add remaining ingedients; mix well.   Brush over dough. Cut slits in top.   Bake at 400 for 20-25 minutes or until golden brown.  Cut into squares.

recipes.name: Savory Chicken Squares
recipes.instructions: Roll dough 1/4 inch thick and roll in 4x4 squares spoon 1/4 cup meat mixture on center of each square. Bring up corners and twist together. Brush top with butter and dip in croutons. Bake on ungreased cookie sheet at 350 degrees for 20 to 25 minutes.

recipes.name: Schnicker Doodles
recipes.instructions:
Cream sugar and shortening, add egg and vanilla. Sift together dry ingredients. Add to creamed mixture. Roll dough into 1 inch balls and roll in granulated sugar. Bake 15 minutes at 400 degrees.
2009 cook 11 min @  400

recipes.name: Scones
recipes.instructions: Scald milk. Combine sugar, shortening, and potatoes. Add milk. Mix - when cool add yeast mixture, then dry ingredients (enough to make a soft dough). Roll or smash flat with fingers. Deep fry 2-6 minutes at 375 degrees.

recipes.name: Sesame Pork Tenderloin
recipes.instructions: Place pork in a large resealable plastic bag. Add the soy sauce, oil, ginger and garlic; seal and turn to coat. Refrigerate for 4 hours or overnight, turning ocasionally.  drain and discard marinade. Place pork on a greased rack in a foil-lined shallow roasting pan. Combine honey and brown sugar; spoon over pork. Sprinkle with seasame seeds. Bake uncovered, at 375 degrees for 30-40 minutes before slicing.   yield: 8 servings.

recipes.name: Shredded Potatoes And Whipping Cream

ingredients.ingredient: Potatoes, Enough To Fill The Baking Dish

recipes.instructions: Peal and shred the potatoes. Rinse with cool water until water is clear. Pat dry. Layer grated potatoes with salt until dish is full. Then pour cream over mixture until cream is level with a fork when pushing down on the potatoes. Bake slowly at 250 for 2 hours or even more until done. If baked slowly they stay white and don't get a crust on top.   you can substitute half cream and half milk if you wish.

recipes.name: Shrimp Newburg
recipes.instructions: Saute onions in butter until tender. Stir in all ingredients. Heat through and serve immediately over rice.

recipes.name: Sloppy Joes
recipes.instructions: Brown ground beef. Drain off grease. Cook all ingredients 20 minutes.

recipes.name: Sour Cream Cookies
recipes.instructions: Cream first five ingredients. Add dry ingredients. Drop by rounded teaspoonfuls on a greased cookie sheet. Bake at 425 for 8-10 minutes until delicately brown.

recipes.name: Sour Cream Enchiladas
recipes.notes: mix soup and sour cream.  spread a little on the bottom of 9 x 13 pan.  spread mixture on center of tortillas and roll.  If mixture remains spread on top and top with cheese.  Bake at 375 until hot.

recipes.name: Sour Cream Nut Mix
recipes.instructions: Shake nuts in a colander to remove excess salt. Cook on medium heat to 225 on a candy thermometer. Stir nuts in fast and dump on a cookie sheet to cool. Break into pieces and store in the fridge.

recipes.name: Sour Cream Peach Pie
recipes.instructions:
Pre heast oven to 375 degrees.  Mix peaches with other ingredients and pour into and unbbaked pie shell.  Bake fro about 30 minutes, until pie is slightly brown.  While the pie bakes, prepare the topping.
     Topping:  1/2 c butter, 1/3 c sugar, 1/3 c flour, 1 tsp cinnamon.    Blend ingredients to the size of small peas.  Sprinkle evenly over pie and bake and additional 15 monutes.  Cool completely before serving.

recipes.name: South Of The Border Gratin
recipes.instructions: In 1 tbsp oil, cook zucchini until brown. Remove and set aside on paper towels. Cook next five ingredients for five minutes. Remove from heat, stir in lemon zest. Stir in zucchini mixture and tomatoes in a casserole dish. Cover and bake 35-40 minutes at 350 degrees. Uncover and sprinkle with cheese. Broil until cheese melts - about 3 minutes.

recipes.name: Southern Sour Cream
recipes.instructions: Mix first five ingredients. Add dry ingredients and nuts. Roll into balls and mash flat witht he bottowm of a greased glass that has been dipped in the cinnamon sugar mixture. Bake at 350 on a greased cookie sheet for 15 minutes.

recipes.name: Spaghetti
recipes.instructions: Brown ground beef. Add spices. Add remaining ingredients to make the tomato sauce. Simmer about 15 minutes and serve over cooked spaghetti.

recipes.name: Spaghetti Sauce (Frozen)
recipes.notes: In a slow cooker saute together the onion, garlic, green pepper, and vegetable oil.  Cook until onion is transparent.   Add the chopped tomatoes, oregano, basil, parsley, sugar, salt, and ground pepper.  Cook for 3 or more hours on low heat.  Let cool.  Place in freezer containers.  Store in freezer.  When ready to use add tomato paste, bay leaves, a little brown sugar, worchestershire sauce and possibly a little ketchup.  Simmer and serve on spaghetti.
recipes.instructions: s

recipes.name: Spanish Rice
recipes.instructions: Combine all in an oven safe pan or casserole. Bake at 350 degrees for one hour. If you wish to cook it on a burner, you will have to watch it carefully and probably add more water as it cooks. This recipe is doubled.

recipes.name: Spareribs, Sweet And Sour
recipes.instructions: Cut each rib into 1 inch pieces. Wipe with a damp coth.  Cook for an hour until tender in salted water to cover.  Drain saving liquid.  Brown rib in  hot fat.  Add sugar mixed with cornstach, salt and vinegar.  Mix  water i n which ribs were cooked, 1/4 c cold water,pineapple juicee and soy sauce.  Add to spareribs.  Cook for a bout 5 minutes or until slightly thickened,stirring occasionally.  Add green pepper and onion and cook a few minutes until vegetables ae slightly tender but still crisp.   Serve with steamed rice.

recipes.name: Spiced Bran Muffins
recipes.instructions: Preheat oven to 350.  Grease 12 tin muffin tray.  Warm molasses & honey over low heat.  Whisk the egg whites, yogurt and milk together.  Whisk in molasses & honey.  Using a wooden spoon, stir in the bran, flour, baking powder and spices.  Fold in the walnuts & raisins.   Bake for 15 or 20 minutes.

recipes.name: Spinach Dip
recipes.instructions: Thaw spinach and squeeze dry.  Stir together: soup mix, sour cream and mayonaisse until blended.  Stir in spinach, water chestnuts, and onions.  Cover.  Chill 2 hours.  Stir before serving.  Makes 4 cups.

recipes.name: Spinach Dip Wreath
recipes.instructions: Cut out 3 inch ring on top of 1 loaf of bread and hollow out.   Reserved scooped  out bread.  Spoon spinach dip into hollowed out ring.  Arrange other ingredients around and refrigerate until serving time.   Tear remaining loaf of bread into bite-size pieces.  Use torn pieces and scooped out bread for dipping.

recipes.name: Spinach Salad
recipes.notes: great!
recipes.instructions: Process in blender.  Makes about 3/4 cup

recipes.name: Spinach Salad Cranberry
recipes.instructions:
Brown almons in butter.  Combine Spinach, cooled almonds, and cranberries.  
Combine dressing and toss.

recipes.name: Spinach Salad Strawberry
recipes.instructions: Mix first 8 ingredients in a blender.  Chill one hour.  Toss with remaining ingredients

ingredients.ingredient: Sugar,   Blend For About 30 Sec., Pour

recipes.name: Spudnuts
recipes.instructions: Dissolve yeast in warm water and 1 Tbsp sugar.  Cream sugar, shortening, salt and potatoes.  Add remaining ingredients and mix thoroughly.  Let raise until double in bulk.  Roll 1/2 inch thick and cut with donut cutter. Let raise again.  Fry in deep hot fat.  Glaze while hot.  Makes about 6 dozen.

recipes.name: Stir Drop Oatmeal
recipes.instructions: Heat oven to 375.  Sift dry ingredients together.  Add sugar and rolled oats.  Mix in oil, milk and eggs.  Add nuts, raisins, etc.  Drop teaspoonfuls of dough about 2 inches apart on lightly greased baking sheet.  Bake about 10 minutes.  Makes about 3 dozen.

recipes.name: Strawberry Frosty Squares
recipes.instructions: Mix crust and put on a cookie sheet.  Bake at 350 fro 10-15 minutes. Stir occasionally until light brown.  Beat filling in  a bowl on high speed until stiff peaks form.  Fold in 1 C whipping cream (Dream Whip works well).  Sprinkle bottom of baking dish with 2/3 crust.  Pour filling and sprinkle remainder of crust on top. Note: beaters must be very clean or stiff peaks will not form.

recipes.name: Strawberry Pie
recipes.notes: from newspaper  column - Desperation Dinners
recipes.instructions:
Prepare crust and bake.  In a 2-quart or larger saucepan, whisk together sugar, cornstarch and lemon-lime soda.  Place over high heat, and bring to a rolling boil, stirring frequently.  Boil for 1 minute or until slightly thick. 
Remove from heat, and add jell-o and lemon juice, stirring well.  Set aside to cool (consistency will be like warm pudding upon some cooling, and will further thicken in the refrigerator.   Rinse and cap strawberries, cutting any large size berries into bite size pieces.  Place the berries in the cooled crust and spoon the filling (ok if it is slightly warm) over the berries.  Refrigerate until set at least 1 hr and up to 8 hrs.   To serve, slice and top with whipped cream.

recipes.name: Swedish Spritz
recipes.notes: This is a family recipe.  I got it from Aunt Neva.  She was a sister to my Dad, Willard Thorell.
recipes.instructions: This is Aunt Annie's recipe as given to Aunt  Neva (Clayton).  Do not beat sugar and butter fluffy, just stir.  It may need more flour.  The ridges need to look cracked, not smooth coming out of the cookie gun. Bake high in the oven at 375 for 8 to 10 u

recipes.name: Sweet & Sour Chicken
recipes.instructions: Brown chicken in hot oil until lightly browned.   Add peppers, carrot and garlic.  Mix cornstarch with soy sauce; add to pan with pineapple and juice, vinegar, sugar and ginger.   Bring to a full boil.   Serve chicken mixture over rice.

recipes.name: Szechuan Vegetable Lo Mein

ingredients.ingredient: Chicken Broth Or 3 1/2 Cups Water Plus
Oriental Curly Noodles Or Angle Hair Pas

recipes.instructions: 1.  Combine broth, garlic, ginger and red pepper in a wok.  Cover and bring to a boil. 2.  Add noodles and vegetables, return to a boil.  Simmer 5-6 minutes. 3.  Stir in soy sauce, sesame oil and green onions.  Cook 3 minutes. 4.  Thicken with cornstarch, if desired.  Otherrwise ladle into bowls.

recipes.name: Tabboule

ingredients.ingredient: Fresh Mint (or 1 Tbls Dry Mint Powder)

recipes.instructions: In mixing bowl, combine bulgur, tomatoes with their juice.  Let stand at room temperature for about 30 minutes, until bulgur is soft.  Add the remaining ingredients.  Prepare dressing and pour over mixture.   Mix well.  Chill.

recipes.name: Taco Salad Mexican
recipes.instructions: 1.  Cook beef  and onion until beef is brtwned;drain. Sir in salsa, water and seasoning mix. Bring to a boil.  Reduce heat to low; cook for 2 to 3 minutes.  Stir in beans and chiles.      2.  Layer ingredients as follows in each shell: 1 c lettuce, 3/4 meat mixtue, 2 Tbls. cheese, guacamole and tomatoes.  Serve with taco sauce.

recipes.name: Texas Sheet Cake
recipes.instructions: Mix flour, sugar and salt.   Bring butter, oil, cocoa and water to a boil, then add to flour mixture.  Add remaining ingredients.  Mix and pour into large cookie sheet.  Bake 20 minutes at 375.   While it is baking make the frosting.  Frosting: 6 Tbls Butter 3 Tbls Cocoa 4 1/2 Tbls Milk 2 tsp. Vanilla 1 Pound Powdered Sugar  Bring first four ingredients to a boil.  Remove from heat and add powdered sugar; stirring until smooth.   Spread over cake while it is still warm.

recipes.name: Texas Sheet Cake
recipes.instructions: Mix flour, sugar and salt.   Bring butter, oil, cocoa and water to a boil, then add to flour mixture.  Add remaining ingredients.  Mix and pour into large cookie sheet.  Bake 20 minutes at 375.   While it is baking make the frosting.  Frosting: 6 Tbls Butter 3 Tbls Cocoa 4 1/2 Tbls Milk 2 tsp. Vanilla 1 Pound Powdered Sugar  Bring first four ingredients to a boil.  Remove from heat and add powdered sugar; stirring until smooth.   Spread over cake while it is still warm.

recipes.name: Thanksgiving Jello
recipes.instructions: Mix and dissolve jello, sugar and water.  Mix in orange juice and apples.    Set jello and serve with whipped cream on top.

recipes.name: Thanksgiving Yams
recipes.instructions: Heat until thick and pour over yams in casserole.  Add apples & raisins if desired.

recipes.name: Tiny Cream Puffs
recipes.instructions: Combine butter and water.  Heat to boiling.   Add flour and salt all at once.  Stir vigorously.   Cook sriting constantly until mixture pulls away from sides and forms a ball.  Remove from heat and cool slightly. Add eggs one at a time beating vigorously.  Drop by scant teaspoonfuls on a greased sheet.   Bake at 400 degrees for 20 minutes.   At serving time cut off top and fill with favorite seafood or chicken salad or ice cream topped with chocolate sauce or pudding.

recipes.name: Traditional Dixie Salad
recipes.notes: from Shannon Pitchforth
recipes.instructions: Mix together with whipped cream, slightly sweetened or Cool Whip.  Put in the bananas  at the last minute.

recipes.name: Traditional Dixie Salad
recipes.notes: from Shannon Pitchforth
recipes.instructions: Mix together with whipped cream, slightly sweetened or Cool Whip.  Put in the bananas  at the last minute.

recipes.name: Turkey Dressing
recipes.instructions: Beat eggs, add to cream and fold.    Fry second set of ingredients until celery and onions begin to turn clear.  put with broken up hamburger buns and then pour cream and egg mixture over the top.   Fold all togther until well mixed.   Stuff into turkey, but don't crowd.   Serves about 10.

recipes.name: Turkey Tomato Soup
recipes.instructions: Combine first 9 ingredients.   Bring to a boil.  reduce heat; cover and simmer for 50 sinutes.  Add turkey and vegetables  Cover and simmer 50 minutes longer or until vegetables are tender.

recipes.name: Twice Baked Potatoes
recipes.instructions: After potatoes have baked, cut them in half lengthwise and scoop out potato leaving shell   Whip potatoes and all ingredients except cheese.  Put mixture back in potato shells and top with grated cheddar  cheese.  Bake at 350 for 20 minutes.

recipes.name: Twice Cooked Divinity
recipes.instructions: Stir sugar, corn syrup, water and salt until dissolved.   Boil to soft crack stage.   Beat egg whites until stiff but not dry.   Gradually pour 1/3 of the syrup over the egg whites beating constantly.   Cool the remaining syrup to light crack stage.   When mixture holds its shape when dropped by teaspoonfuls, add 1 tsp vanilla.   Drop by teaspoonfuls onto greased cookie sheet.

recipes.name: Veggie Chili Con Queso
recipes.instructions: Heat all ingredients except cheese to boiling; reduced heat and simmer, covered, for 30 minutes.   Remove from heat and add cheese.

recipes.name: Waffles, Pumpkin
recipes.notes: beat whites, mix dry ingredients, add wet ingredients.  fold in whipped egg whites.
recipes.instructions: white

recipes.name: Yogurt Pie
recipes.instructions: Blend and pour into store bought chocoloate crust.  Refrigerate over night or 8 hours.

recipes.name: Zucchini Bars
recipes.instructions: Combine ingredients as for cookies.  Bake at 350 degrees 20-25 min. Frost when cool

recipes.name: Zucchini Chicken
recipes.instructions: Saute onion with chicken.  Steam zucchini for 5 minutes and then drain. Combine soup, cheese and sour cream.  Add zucchini.  Combine stuffing mix and margarine.  Spread half of stuffing mix in an 8x11 inch pan; layer chicken mixture, then zucchini.  Cover with remaining stuffing mix.   Bake at 350 for 30 minutes. Yeilds 8 servings.

recipes.name: Zucchini Pie
recipes.instructions: Heat oven to 400.   Lightly grease bottom and side of glass pie plate. Sprinkle zucchini, tomato, onion & cheese evenly on pie plate.  Stir together remaining ingredients with fork until blended.  Bake about 35 minutes o until knife inserted comes out clean.   Cool at least 10 minutes.

recipes.name: Zuchinni Lemon Bread
recipes.notes: oven 350 for 60 minutes.  2 -4 x 8 loaf pans, greased and floured.    Whisk together flour and next 3 ingred.,  Combine sugar and next 4 ingredients,  Add to four mixture Mix lightly  Add Zuchinni and pour into pans and bake.
